          Singapore Leading POS System

          EPOS is recognised by IMDA as one of the top POS vendors in Singapore. We are one of the largest suppliers of modern POS systems in Singapore’s Retail, F&B and Minimart industries.

          Learn More

          1. 15″ Touchscreen Terminal

          2. Automatic Multi-Angle Ball Scanner

          3. Handheld Scanner

          15″ Touchscreen Terminal

          Smooth and responsive touchscreen terminal with Integrated Customer Display makes the checkout process a breeze. 

          Cash Drawer

          Integrated cash register that comes with a key for greater safety and reliability.

          Customer Display

          Easily display key information to your customers.

          Automatic Multi-Angle Ball Scanner

          Quick, efficient and designed for cashier convenience.

          Handheld Scanner

          Scan each item quickly and efficiently, designed for cashier convenience.

          Handheld Stock Scanner

          Mobile device that allows you to perform stock takes quickly and effectively.

          Retail Barcode Printer

          Speed up your inventory labelling process by printing product barcodes directly from your POS.

          80mm Receipt Printer

          Highly reliable, rodless label roll holder for easy loading and smooth printing.

          Keyboard and Mouse

          Keyboard and mouse available for those who prefer more traditional controls.
